page.title: 14TONMAWR - RECREATION 1
page.content: 1.{PIGEON KEEPING:}there are many pigeon fanciers in the village, with extensive lofts in the gardens 2.{CHOIRS:}choral singing is very popular. There are two choirs, for men and women respectively, but it is the male voice choir that has the highest status. Weekly choir practices are well attended. 3.{SCRAMBLING}The open pasture land, the grassed over coal tips, and the railway embankments provide motor cyclists with much opportunity to practice rough riding. Tracks scarred across the hills by these riders are evident. The practitioners range from young boys of 8 to a grandfather. 4.{BINGO}bingo sessions are held in the community centre which is in Danycoed and outside the block, but they are popular with Tonmawr people.
